name: Iron tools pipeline
goal: Smelt iron and craft iron tools/armor using available fuel and crafting options
environment: Track perceived fuel sources like logs, coal, or lava buckets
Note nearby furnaces or crafting tables; craft them if missing
Avoid mining directly above/below to stay safe

steps.title: Survey resources
steps.details: From the latest observation, list nearby ore veins, stone, coal, crafting stations, and inventory fuel. Include entity proximity to avoid ambush while mining.
checks: Confirm at least wooden_pickaxe or better is available

steps.title: Gather wood and stone
steps.details: Chop any logs and craft planks/sticks. Mine cobblestone with the safest available pickaxe to build a furnace and stone tools if iron tools are not yet made.

steps.title: Acquire fuel
steps.details: Mine coal if present; otherwise smelt logs into charcoal or use leftover planks as fuel. Keep some wood reserved for sticks and building blocks.
checks: Avoid smelting without spare wood for sticks

steps.title: Mine iron safely
steps.details: Locate iron ore using perception hints; mine while keeping a block underfoot and blocking off exposed lava or mobs. Collect at least 9 raw iron for tools and a shield.
checks: Carry blocks to bridge or block lava
Keep exit lit to reduce mob spawns

steps.title: Smelt and craft
steps.details: Place or use a furnace; smelt raw iron with chosen fuel. Craft iron pickaxe, sword/axe, bucket, and armor as resources allow. Prioritize shield first if hostile mobs nearby.

notes: If coal is missing, produce charcoal from logs. Keep spare blocks for emergency towers or walls.
